channel.title: You all realize executing the Assassin/Converted Unseen during the day helps Unseen right?
channel.description:
If you're hanging the Assassin during the day but don't know who the Mastermind is, all you are doing is allowing them to convert somebody else at night and cause more chaos as one of your precious confirmed BD players may now be evil.
Converting somebody counts as a kill. It is technically BETTER than a kill because it adds to the evil majority.
If you find the Assassin, occupy him until you can kill the Mastermind.

item.title: You all realize executing the Assassin/Converted Unseen during the day helps Unseen right?
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
I try to explain , nobody listens

day 2
overly lucky observer : yay bob Is unseen .
everyone but me : hang him yay .
me : umm could be scorned guys , and if not he’s assassin , someone occupy him for a few days maybe ? whilst we look for the mastermind ?
Everyone else : die die die ,
Random guy : kill all neuts
Random guy 2 : assasins aren’t neuts
Random guy : kill all neuts , then kill random guy 2 .
Everyone but “me” votes to kill assassin.
Such and such was an assassin
Everyone Else : ayayyayayy wahey the lads !!!
Everyone Else : get “me” tomorrow he didn’t want to kill the assassin !!!

me : meh

Read full topic
item.source: You all realize executing the Assassin/Converted Unseen during the day helps Unseen right?

item.title: You all realize executing the Assassin/Converted Unseen during the day helps Unseen right?
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
Tell me about it, there used to be a regular copy-paste I always saw in peoples will explaining that if you find the assasain early you need to block/jail him while looking for the rest of the unseen. I’m still looking to find the text of it because whoever wrote it, put it far better than I was able to.

I spent almost my entire time in the graveyard one game trying to explain why I opposed killing the assasain we found on day 2 (drunk hit him). I think it took almost the entire game before I was able to explain it to people.

Read full topic
